name: Okta Login
description: For implementing secure and streamlined user access.

items.name: React and React Native okta login authentication workflow

name: Support Initiatives
description: Supporting other teams with critical integrations and UI enhancements.

items.name: DCMS/QT API Integration Support
items.description: Replace the existing API with DCMS/QT API to streamline user management workflows, including adding, editing, and a new deletion flow.

name: React Native Developer Documentation Enhancement
description: Enhance the React Native developer documentation to improve developer experience and resource accessibility.

items.name: Component Playground for React Native
items.description: Develop a component playground within the React Native documentation to allow developers to interactively test and experiment with components.

items.description: Consolidate multiple React Native repositories into a single, organized repository.

name: CLI Templates
description: To streamline project setup and enhance developer experience.

name: Patch Release and Bug Fixes
description: Address critical bug fixes and patch release across targeted repositories, ensuring stability and performance improvements.
